title: Customer Satisfaction Survey
description: Gather feedback from customers about their experience with your product or service

intro.title: We Value Your Feedback
intro.description: Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey. Your feedback helps us improve our products and services.

satisfaction_level.title: How satisfied are you with our product/service?
satisfaction_level.description: Please select the option that best describes your satisfaction level

likes.title: What did you like most about our product/service?
likes.description: Please share what aspects you enjoyed the most

improvements.title: How can we improve our product/service?
improvements.description: Please share any suggestions for improvement

recommendation_rating.title: How likely are you to recommend us to others?
recommendation_rating.description: Please rate on a scale of 1-5, where 1 is 'Not at all likely' and 5 is 'Extremely likely'

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: We appreciate your feedback. Your input helps us improve our products and services.
